todos.content: Rename octo-bridge -> oqto-bridge in pi-agent-extensions repo (directory + all references)
Rename octo-todos -> oqto-todos in pi-agent-extensions repo (directory + all references)
Rename octo_phase -> oqto_phase status key (extensions + backend pi_translator.rs)
Rename octo_title_changed -> oqto_title_changed status key (extensions + backend)
Update all markdown/docs references (README, CHANGELOG, OAUTH-FIX, AGENTS.md)
Rename OctoTodosConfig and related types to OqtoTodosConfig
Update backend pi_translator.rs to match new status keys
Build and test backend after changes
